# carTraitCollection

**Instance Property**

The trait collection of the vehicle’s primary screen.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var carTraitCollection: UITraitCollection { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this trait collection to derive metrics, such as display scale, for your CarPlay templates. For example, images you display in a [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListTemplate] can use this trait collection’s display scale rather than the scale of the user’s iPhone screen.
